content.text:
# Sweet potato yellow dwarf virus

Sweet potato yellow dwarf virus (SPYDV) is a plant pathogenic virus of the family Potyviridae.
External links
*[http://phene.cpmc.columbia.edu/ICTVdB/00.057.0.85.002.htm ICTVdB - The Universal Virus Database: Sweet potato yellow dwarf virus]
*[http://www.virology.net/Big_Virology/BVFamilyGroup.html Family Groups - The Baltimore Method]
